name: Juggler (denoide)
description:
Test yourself in this game of skill based on real jugglers and pong!

Compete with your friends and yourself for the highest score in multiple stages in which you have to always catch the ball before it goes out of the ring!

ORIGINAL CONCEPT!

Juggler put you in charge of 4 bar controlled by the sliding of your thumb, based on the direction you slide your thumb, all 4 bar rotate in a specific direction, you have to catch all the ball(s) using only these bars and figuring out the peculiarity of each stage!

MULTIPLE GAME TYPES

Test yourself in 3 (for the moment) stages that require you to catch the ball(s) with different obstacles and concepts to handle during the gameplay!

INFINITE RUN

Each stage is randomly selected at the end of each stage, for a high score, you need to master each level and be prepared for every successions of stage ! Are you prepared for that?

8 BIT LIKE GRAPHICS

Designed to be a tribute to classic Games like Pong, Breakout and other 70s/80s classic games, all the graphics was designed by hand to be an expressive tribute to the classic as well as functional!

ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK COMPOSED FOR THE GAME!

Each sound featured in the game has been created only for this one to be a tribute to old arcade games! Square Wave Synth with modern sound here we go!

CHECK YOUR HIGH SCORE AND CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS!

At the end of each game, the score totalized is saved and you can see that on the dedicated page, the last 4 score are also saved in order to let you understand if there are some improvements!
